item.title: QA Metrics: Leading and Lagging Indicators Every Tester Should Know
item.description: Hey there, fellow techies! ðŸ‘‹ Today, we’re diving into the world of Quality Assurance metrics. Specifically, we’ll be unpacking the dynamic duo of leading and lagging indicators. Buckle up, because this ride through the QA landscape is going to be both fun and informative! The Metric Tango: Leading vs. Lagging Link to heading Before we jump into the nitty-gritty, let’s break down what we mean by leading and lagging indicators. Think of them as the fortune tellers and historians of the QA world:
